4-5 assay panels for Sepsis, one assay to detect Zika, Dengue, Chikungunya when the COVID-19 pandemic began. Reallocating resources, they’ve rapidly developed COVID-19 assays. The Sepsis and Zika, Dengue, and Chikungunya assays will follow soon.
